summary: Just a simple house in Riverwood for those not wanting something overly complex. Comes with alchemy, enchanting, and a garden outside.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]About:[/size]
Just a simple house in Riverwood. I only made this because I really like Riverwood and all the house mods for Riverwood were either way too complex or just not to my tastes.
[size=3]
House Includes:[/size]
[list]
[*]Organized storage for things like potions and soul gems
[*]Working bookshelf
[*]Alchemy
[*]Enchanting
[*]Bees
[/list]
[size=3]Requirements:
[/size]None

[size=3]Install:
[/size]Just copy the files from the data folder into your Skyrim data folder.
Or just use NMM.Â 

[size=3]Credits:
[/size]Bethesda for Creation Kit and Skyrim
Brumbek for SMIM I guess some of the texture files got included (not needed to run tho)
author: yoh4n3
